text: satyaviśvāsikaḷē, niṅṅaḷ satyaviśvāsinikaḷe vivāhaṁ kaḻikkukayuṁ, enniṭṭ niṅṅaḷavare sparśikkunnatin mumpāyi avare vivāhamēācanaṁ naṭattukayuṁ ceytāl niṅṅaḷ eṇṇikaṇakkākkunna iddaḥ ācarikkēṇṭa bādhyata avarkku niṅṅaḷēāṭilla. ennāl niṅṅaḷ avarkk matā'a nalkukayuṁ, avare bhaṅgiyāyi piriccayakkukayuṁ ceyyuka
